comments.body:
Why are you asking everyone to put in their address and other personal identifying information? I don't think it is ethical to collect this kind of data in the first place. If you want to meet and introduce yourself to others, there are WhatsApp groups and Discord servers set up for that (and even there, ensure you maintain your privacy). u/ChromaticChaos, please take down this post. 

To anyone reading this comment - **do not share your personal details with anyone on the internet**, this includes your real name, address, and pictures. There are weird people on the internet, remember to keep yourself safe.
